abstract.t: This document describes a TRILL based DCI solution. TRILL is predominantly used inside a data center for providing intra-data center switching optimally by utilizing multiple links. This draft provides a way to extend the TRILL network across different data center via MPLS service provider network using VTSD. VTSD (Virtual TRILL Service/Switch Domain) is specified in draft [VTSD]. This document also proposes extensions to existing TRILL protocol to meet the requirement of data center interconnect.
